raw_comment: Young people reach out to their parents most over text compared to call. In person has the lowest amount of young people reaching out to their parents. I wonder why young people have little interaction with their parents
ace_sentences: Young people reach out to their parents most over text messages.
Young people reach out to their parents less over phone calls than over text messages.
Young people reach out to their parents least in person.
I wonder why young people have little interaction with their parents.
